definition: (bird species of China) great frigatebird (Fregata minor)
(bird species of China) lesser frigatebird (Fregata ariel)
(bird species of China) Christmas frigatebird (Fregata andrewsi)

sentences.english: At this moment the cannon of the harbor is heard firing, and Suzuki hurries in, saying that it is a warship.
sentences.chinese: 就在這時港口一聲炮響，鈴木跑進來說是一艘軍艦。

sentences.english: We can see warships sailing on the sea.
sentences.chinese: 我們能看到軍艦在海上航行。

sentences.english: Navy, there are 2310 ships, also calculate to depend a chart.
sentences.chinese: 海軍，有二三十條軍艦吧，還算靠譜。

sentences.english: Our warships bottled up the enemy fleet in the harbour.
sentences.chinese: 我方軍艦把敵方艦隊圍困在港口內。

sentences.english: A navy warship has arrived near the disaster area carrying tents and food supplies.
sentences.chinese: 一艘載有帳篷和食品供給的軍艦已抵達災區附近。

sentences.english: Three vessels have just completed an anti - piracy tour in the Gulf of Aden .
sentences.chinese: 三首軍艦在亞丁灣巡洋剛剛全部完成了反海盜的任務。

sentences.english: Beijing denounced the Japanese vessel for shadowing exercises by some of its own warships.
sentences.chinese: 北京則譴責日本艦船隱瞞其軍艦的軍事演習。

sentences.english: Kouchner says the European ships would reach the Gulf of Aden sometime in December.
sentences.chinese: 庫什內說，歐盟軍艦可以在12月抵達亞丁灣。

sentences.english: Three invading battleships were sunk at one stroke.
Area as well as rivers and streams lake mine attack barrier warship.
sentences.chinese: 區以及江河湖泊佈設水雷障礙的軍艦。

sentences.english: A number of warships operating together under one command.
sentences.chinese: 在統一指揮下一齊行動的一批軍艦。

sentences.english: A hovering mar-of-war bird showed him where dolphin were chasing some flying fish.
sentences.chinese: 一隻盤旋的軍艦鳥給他指明瞭海豚追逐飛魚的地方。
兩艘軍艦爲運兵船護航。

sentences.english: Chinese ships will be docking for visits at U. S.
sentences.chinese: 中國的軍艦將在不遠的將來訪問美海軍，洛克利爾說。

sentences.english: But when American warships arrived in Samoa, so did a big storm.
sentences.chinese: 但當美國的軍艦到達薩摩來羣島時，遭遇到了大風暴。

sentences.english: The navy's biggest vessels currently are a pair of smaller helicopter carriers.
sentences.chinese: 日本海軍目前最大的軍艦是兩艘較小的直升機航母。

definition: aircraft carrier/CL:艘[sou1]/(coll.) (fig.) sth huge/(like) a whale
to fish for (aquatic animals and plants)/to catch
